Theme

Use theme prop to override the look and feel of the feedback reporter to match your app.

Themes Presets#

Base
Champagne
Crystal
Dark
Grape
Navy Blue
Pastel Gray
Tea Green

Theme Object#

{
textVariants: {
h1: {
fontSize: 26,
fontWeight: 600,
lineHeight: 26 * 1.167,
letterSpacing: 3,
marginBottom: 26,
},
h2: {
fontSize: 24.44,
fontWeight: 600,
lineHeight: 24.44 * 1.2,
letterSpacing: 2,
marginBottom: 24.44,
},

fontWeight: 600,

marginBottom: 22.88,
},

lineHeight: 21.32 * 1.235,

marginBottom: 21.32,
},

lineHeight: 19.5 * 1.334,
letterSpacing: 0.5,
marginBottom: 19.5,
},

fontSize: 17.94,

marginBottom: 17.94,
},

},

},
